title: broadbandProductSpecDetail
description: Details of an Broadband product specification. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Broadband Product Specification Detail.

objectType.description: The type of the object, broadbandProductSpecDetail.

type.description: The specific type of product being detailed.

uploadSpeed.description: The upload speed for the Product Spec (e.g. 10Mbps, 100Mbps, 1Gbps, 10Gbps).

downloadSpeed.description: The download speed for the Product Spec (e.g. 10Mbps, 100Mbps, 1Gbps, 10Gbps).

accessMedium.description: The type of medium the product should be delivered over (e.g., FIBER, COAX, TWISTED_PAIR).

accessTechnology.description: The underlying technology used to transmit data across the Access Medium (e.g., DOCSIS_3.0).

cpeMake.description: The brand of Customer Premise Equipment (CPE) provided as part of the product (e.g., Arris).

cpeModel.description: The model of Customer Premise Equipment (CPE) provided as part of the product (e.g. Surfboard SB6141).

dhcpSupport.description: An indicator that specifies whether DHCP services are provided as a standard part of the product offer.

bridgeMode.description: An indicator that specifies whether routers are configured in bridge mode as part of the product offer.

staticIpAddresses.description: The maximum number of Static IP addresses available as part of the product.

publicIpV4Addresses.description: The number of dynamically assigned public IPv4 addresses available as part of the product.

publicIpV6Addresses.description: The number of dynamically assigned public IPv6 addresses available as part of the product.

serviceLevelAgreement.description: The standard level of service provided as part of the product.
